articles.title: Twitter engineering boss quits after DeSantis launch glitches - BBC
articles.description: Ron DeSantis' launch of his White House presidential campaign was hit by technical problems.
articles.content:
An engineering chief at Twitter says he is leaving the company the day after the launch of Ron DeSantis' US presidential campaign on the platform was hit with technical glitches.

articles.title: Upgraded LIGO Reactivated: Resumes Unraveling Universe's Secrets With Enhanced Gravitational Wave Detection - SciTechDaily

articles.content:
